attributes.action: Close schools and colleges to contain the outbreak of Convid-19
attributes.additional_details: You as the government need to Close schools and colleges and universities to help contain the global outbreak of Convid-19, children and staff are at high risk WHO stated so we need to try and contain this as much as possible. This should have been done a long time ago! Help stop the spread of convid-19!
